headline: Gartner: Rating Downgrade As Growth Outlook Disappoints
summary: Gartner's 2Q25 results showed headline strength, but a sharp slowdown in forward-looking metrics forced a revenue guidance cut and reset investor expectations. Learn more on IT stock here.

raw.headline: Gartner: Rating Downgrade As Growth Outlook Disappoints

headline: Sinch Recognized in Gartner® 2025 Critical Capabilities for CPaaS
summary: Sinch AB (publ) (XSTO: SINCH), which is pioneering the way the world communicates through its Customer Communications Cloud, today announced it has been acknowledged in the 2025 Gartner® Critical Capabilities for Communications Platform as a Service (CPaaS) report. Sinch ranked #1 out of all evaluated vendors for both the Multinational Organizations and Video Use Cases.

headline: 2 Reasons IT is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Gartner’s stock price has taken a beating over the past six months, shedding 51.6% of its value and falling to $243.33 per share. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
